COMMAND.NAME: setcolors
COMMAND.PARAMETER: windowName The name of the e93 window this command will act upon.
foregroundColor Specifies the foreground color of the window.
backgroundColor Specifies the background color of the window.
styleNum The style in the window that the colors will be set for. The default is 0.
COMMAND.STATUS:
This command will return an error in the following cases:
windowName is not provided.
windowName is not an e93 window.
